title: Southgate backs youth for England's World Cup squad
text:
Southgate backs youth for England's World Cup squad 7:11am BST - 01:22
England manager Gareth Southgate says he has picked young players in the Three Lions' World Cup squad because ''they're the best in their positions''. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
